com.bitplan.mediawiki.japi.jaxb

Interface JaxbFactoryApi<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Api.ApiFactory, JaxbFactory

    public interface JaxbFactoryApi<T>
    generic conversion of instance to and from xml/json
    Author:
    wf
